aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.subheading: About the founders of Shadow And Sillage

content.subheading: Two collectors chasing the scent of something rare
content.one: The city sleeps, but somewhere in the dark, a couple sits beneath the warm hum of a desk lamp. Bottles line the shelves like suspects waiting to be questioned ‚Äî amber glass, faded labels, whispers of other lives. That‚Äôs where you‚Äôll find us: Brian and Amanda, the husband-and-wife team behind Shadow and Sillage.
content.two: It started simply enough - one perfume too many to remember, one story too good to lose. We began keeping notes, first on scraps of paper, then in a ledger, and finally in this growing archive. What began as a way to track our collection became something larger: a gathering place for others who chase memories through scent.
content.three: This little speakeasy of fragrance runs on curiosity. Every new listing is a lead, every review a clue. The database grows quietly in the background, one house and one scent at a time, as we piece together the strange and beautiful puzzle of perfume. You might call it obsession; we call it devotion.
content.four: We built this place for the romantics and the detectives of scent ‚Äî the ones who can find memory in a base note or joy in a single spark of aldehyde. If you notice a bottle missing from our shelves, you can send word through the forms scattered around the site. We‚Äôll take the tip, follow the trail, and add it to the case file.
content.five: The door‚Äôs always open. Step in from the rain, hang your coat, and stay awhile. In Shadow and Sillage, every scent has a story, and every story deserves to be found.

howItWorks.heading: The Game of Bottles and Trust
howItWorks.subheading: You list, you discover, you trade ‚Äî all in the quiet glow of discretion.

section1.title: Step One: Light Your Match ‚Äî Create an Account
section1.content: The story begins when you decide to step out of the fog. Creating an account opens the door to everything Shadow and Sillage has to offer ‚Äî a place where collectors and dreamers cross paths. With an account, you can rate and review perfumes, share your impressions, list your own decants, and save favorites to return to later. Those who prefer to stay in the shadows may still wander and search the site, but the full experience belongs to those who join the inner circle.
section1.content2: Accounts are free for the first 100 members, a nod to the early few who saw the potential in the scent of mystery. And rest assured ‚Äî your information stays yours. We don‚Äôt sell it, trade it, or pass it along. What happens in the shadows stays there.

section2.title: Step Two: List Your Decants ‚Äî Share the Scent
section2.content: Every bottle tells a story, but some are meant to be shared. When you list your decants, you‚Äôre offering more than a few milliliters ‚Äî you‚Äôre inviting another collector into your narrative. Describe your perfume, note its character, and let others discover its charm. Maybe it‚Äôs something rare, maybe it‚Äôs something familiar. Either way, the act of sharing connects you to a community that knows the language of scent better than words ever could.
section2.content2: Each listing is handled with care ‚Äî we don‚Äôt touch the trades or the payments, but we give you the stage to make them happen safely and transparently.

section3.title: Step Three: Build Your Wishlist ‚Äî Chase the One That Got Away
section3.content: Everyone has that one perfume ‚Äî the elusive note that lingers in memory long after it‚Äôs gone. Your wishlist is where longing takes form. Add your favorites, the ones you‚Äôve loved, lost, or longed for, and keep them close. When someone lists what you‚Äôre after, you‚Äôll be the first to catch wind of it.
section3.content2: Think of it as your personal scent journal ‚Äî a map of desire and discovery. Over time, it becomes a portrait of taste, mood, and moments that still haunt you.

section4.title: Step Four: Make the Trade ‚Äî The Quiet Exchange
section4.content: When two collectors meet under the faint light of curiosity, a trade begins. You reach out, make your offer, and strike your deal. We stay out of the transaction ‚Äî no middlemen, no cut, no interference. What passes between you and your trading partner stays yours alone.
section4.content2: We provide the meeting place, the silence, and the trust. Every deal made here is built on respect for the art of perfume and the people who keep that art alive. The rest ‚Äî the thrill, the risk, the satisfaction ‚Äî is entirely up to you.

section5.title: The Sillage We Leave Behind
section5.content: Shadow and Sillage isn't just a platform ‚Äî it's a gathering of collectors, romantics, and scent detectives who believe perfume is memory in liquid form. Every rating, wishlist, and trade adds another thread to the tapestry of this community. We don't chase trends, and we don't sell secrets. We build a space where passion and privacy share the same breath. In the end, what lingers isn't just the fragrance ‚Äî it's the connection it creates.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How do I add a missing perfume or perfume house?
faq.answer1: If you notice a perfume or perfume house missing from our database, you can submit it using the buttons below. Your submission will be reviewed by an admin before being added to the database. We're always looking to expand our collection and appreciate your help in making Shadow and Sillage more complete.
faq.question2: How does the trading system work?
faq.answer2: Shadow and Sillage provides a platform for collectors to connect and trade. We don't handle transactions or payments directly ‚Äî those are arranged between you and your trading partner. We simply provide the space and tools to make those connections happen safely and transparently.
faq.answer3: Absolutely. We take privacy seriously. We don't sell, trade, or share your personal information. Your data stays yours, and what happens in the shadows stays there.
faq.question4: How do I create an account?
faq.answer4: Creating an account is free and easy. Simply click the 'Sign In' button in the navigation, then choose 'Sign Up' to create your account. Accounts are free for the first 100 members, and we keep it that way to honor our early supporters.
faq.question5: Can I review perfumes without an account?
faq.answer5: You can browse and search the site without an account, but to rate, review, list decants, or build your wishlist, you'll need to create an account. It's free and gives you access to the full Shadow and Sillage experience.
faq.question6: What if I find an error in the database?
faq.answer6: We appreciate your attention to detail! If you spot an error ‚Äî whether it's a misspelling, incorrect information, or a duplicate entry ‚Äî please let us know via email. We'll review it and make corrections as needed.

gist.heading: THE GIST
gist.contentOne: Shadow and Sillage is an independent platform devoted to perfume lovers ‚Äî a place to share reviews, learn, and connect with other collectors. Users may list perfumes and samples for trade, but the dealings themselves are strictly between private individuals.
gist.contentTwo: We do not handle payments, do not verify authenticity, and will not mediate disputes. Think of us as the smoke-filled bar where introductions are made, not the broker of the deal.

tradingAndListing.heading: TRADING AND LISTING
tradingAndListing.contentOne: Trades and exchanges are entirely at your own risk.
tradingAndListing.contentThree: Split (decanted) perfumes are permitted, provided they are genuine and accurately described.
tradingAndListing.contentFour: Any attempt to defraud, misrepresent, or sell stolen goods will result in permanent account removal and possible reporting to relevant authorities.
tradingAndListing.contentFive: Users must describe items truthfully ‚Äî if you‚Äôre listing a vintage bottle, say so; if the label‚Äôs half gone, that‚Äôs part of its story.

accountsAndConduct.heading: ACCOUNTS AND USER CONDUCT
accountsAndConduct.contentOne: You‚Äôll need an account to post reviews, notes, or trades. Browsing and searching are open to everyone.
accountsAndConduct.contentTwo: Keep it civil: no harassment, spam, political or religious debates, or illegal content.
accountsAndConduct.contentThree: This is a perfume community, not a soapbox or battleground. Treat others with the respect you‚Äôd show in a high-end fragrance boutique.

reviewsAndNotes.heading: REVIEWS AND NOTES
reviewsAndNotes.contentOne: Users may submit perfume reviews or leave notes on discussions to help others navigate their scent journeys.
reviewsAndNotes.contentTwo: All content goes through a moderation process to ensure it‚Äôs relevant, fair, and on-topic. We reserve the right to remove or edit submissions that break these rules or drift into unrelated territory.
reviewsAndNotes.contentThree: By posting, you grant Shadow and Sillage the non-exclusive right to display your words and images on the site and in related features (such as listings or community highlights). You retain full ownership of your work.

noGuarantee.heading: NO GUARANTEES
noGuarantee.contentOne: We strive to keep the site polished and running, but we make no promises of uninterrupted service. We may suspend, modify, or remove features without warning ‚Äî sometimes even good things must fade to make room for the new.

liability.heading: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
liability.contentOne: Shadow and Sillage and its operators are not responsible for any loss, damage, or dispute arising from user trades, communications, or listings.
liability.contentTwo: If a deal goes sour, it‚Äôs between the parties involved. The platform merely sets the stage ‚Äî the drama belongs to you.

privacy.heading: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.contentOne: We respect your privacy as much as a perfumer guards a secret formula. Here‚Äôs how we handle your data:

contentList.one: Information Collected: We may collect basic account information (such as username, email, and preferences) to help personalize your experience and improve the site.
contentList.two: Use of Data: Data is used internally only ‚Äî for recommendations, feature improvements, and fraud prevention. It is never sold, never shared with advertisers, and never used for resale or marketing beyond this site.
contentList.three: Cookies: Like many websites, we use cookies to remember your session and keep you logged in.
contentList.four: Security: We take reasonable steps to protect your data, but no system is impenetrable. Handle your account credentials as carefully as you‚Äôd handle your favorite perfume bottle.
contentList.five: Contact: For questions, data requests, or to report suspicious activity, reach us at [INSERT CONTACT EMAIL HERE].

changes.heading: CHANGES TO THIS POLICY
changes.contentOne: We may revise these Terms and this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with a new ‚Äúlast updated‚Äù date. Continuing to use the site after changes means you accept them ‚Äî the way one accepts that the night always carries a hint of mystery.

closing.heading: CLOSING WORDS
closing.contentOne: Shadow and Sillage exists to celebrate the art, science, and stories behind scent. Use it wisely, trade fairly, and remember ‚Äî trust your nose, not a stranger‚Äôs promises.
